name: Netscaler ADC
natural_language_description: 这是 Netscaler ADC 节点。主要用于: Consume Netscaler ADC API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: file

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: upload

certificateFileName.name: certificateFileName
certificateFileName.description: Name of and, optionally, path to the X509 certificate file that is used to form the certificate-key pair. /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.
certificateFileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate File Name | 作用: Name of and, optionally, path to the X509 certificate file that is used to form the certificate-key pair. /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path. | (必填项)

certificateFormat.name: certificateFormat
certificateFormat.description: Input format of the certificate and the private-key files. The three formats supported by the appliance are: PEM - Privacy Enhanced Mail DER - Distinguished Encoding Rule PFX - Personal Information Exchange.
certificateFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate Format | 作用: Input format of the certificate and the private-key files. The three formats supported by the appliance are: PEM - Privacy Enhanced Mail DER - Distinguished Encoding Rule PFX - Personal Information Exchange. | 默认值: PEM | (必填项)

certificateType.name: certificateType
certificateType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate Type | 默认值: ROOT_CERT | (必填项)
available_options: Root-CA (值: ROOT_CERT) - You must specify the key file name. The generated Root-CA certificate can be used for signing end-user client or server certificates or to create Intermediate-CA certificates.
Server (值: SRVR_CERT) - SSL server certificate used on SSL servers for end-to-end encryption
Client (值: CLNT_CERT) - End-user client certificate used for client authentication

certificateRequestFileName.name: certificateRequestFileName
certificateRequestFileName.description: Name for and, optionally, path to the certificate-signing request (CSR). /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.
certificateRequestFileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate Request File Name | 作用: Name for and, optionally, path to the certificate-signing request (CSR). /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path. | (必填项)

caCertificateFileName.name: caCertificateFileName
caCertificateFileName.description: Name of the CA certificate file that issues and signs the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificates
caCertificateFileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: CA Certificate File Name | 作用: Name of the CA certificate file that issues and signs the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificates | (必填项)

caCertificateFileFormat.name: caCertificateFileFormat
caCertificateFileFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: CA Certificate File Format | 作用: Format of the CA certificate | 默认值: PEM | (必填项)

caPrivateKeyFileName.name: caPrivateKeyFileName
caPrivateKeyFileName.description: Private key, associated with the CA certificate that is used to sign the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificate. If the CA key file is password protected, the user is prompted to enter the pass phrase that was used to encrypt the key.
caPrivateKeyFileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: CA Private Key File Name | 作用: Private key, associated with the CA certificate that is used to sign the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificate. If the CA key file is password protected, the user is prompted to enter the pass phrase that was used to encrypt the key. | (必填项)

caPrivateKeyFileFormat.name: caPrivateKeyFileFormat
caPrivateKeyFileFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: CA Private Key File Format | 作用: Format of the CA certificate | 默认值: PEM | (必填项)

privateKeyFileName.name: privateKeyFileName
privateKeyFileName.description: Name of and, optionally, path to the X509 certificate file that is used to form the certificate-key pair. /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.
privateKeyFileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Private Key File Name | 作用: Name of and, optionally, path to the X509 certificate file that is used to form the certificate-key pair. /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path. | (必填项)

caSerialFileNumber.name: caSerialFileNumber
caSerialFileNumber.description: Serial number file maintained for the CA certificate. This file contains the serial number of the next certificate to be issued or signed by the CA.
caSerialFileNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: CA Serial File Number | 作用: Serial number file maintained for the CA certificate. This file contains the serial number of the next certificate to be issued or signed by the CA. | (必填项)

privateKeyFormat.name: privateKeyFormat
privateKeyFormat.description: Format in which the key is stored on the appliance
privateKeyFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Private Key Format | 作用: Format in which the key is stored on the appliance | 默认值: PEM | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: pempassphrase (值: None) - Name for and, optionally, path to the private key. You can either use an existing RSA or DSA key that you own or create a new private key on the Netscaler ADC. This file is required only when creating a self-signed Root-CA certificate. The key file is stored in the /nsconfig/ssl directory by default.

pempassphrase (值: None) - Name for and, optionally, path to the private key. You can either use an existing RSA or DSA key that you own or create a new private key on the Netscaler ADC. This file is required only when creating a self-signed Root-CA certificate. The key file is stored in the /nsconfig/ssl directory by default.
subjectaltname (值: None) - Subject Alternative Name (SAN) is an extension to X.509 that allows various values to be associated with a security certificate using a subjectAltName field
days (值: None) - Number of days for which the certificate will be valid, beginning with the time and day (system time) of creation

certificateKeyPairName.name: certificateKeyPairName
certificateKeyPairName.description: Name for the certificate and private-key pair
certificateKeyPairName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate-Key Pair Name | 作用: Name for the certificate and private-key pair | (必填项)

password.name: password
password.description: Input format of the certificate and the private-key files. The three formats supported by the appliance are: PEM - Privacy Enhanced Mail DER - Distinguished Encoding Rule PFX - Personal Information Exchange.
password.natural_language_description: 参数名: Password | 作用: Input format of the certificate and the private-key files. The three formats supported by the appliance are: PEM - Privacy Enhanced Mail DER - Distinguished Encoding Rule PFX - Personal Information Exchange. | (必填项)

notifyExpiration.name: notifyExpiration
notifyExpiration.description: Whether to alert when the certificate is about to expire
notifyExpiration.natural_language_description: 参数名: Notify When Expires | 作用: Whether to alert when the certificate is about to expire | 默认值: False | (必填项)

notificationPeriod.name: notificationPeriod
notificationPeriod.description: Time, in number of days, before certificate expiration, at which to generate an alert that the certificate is about to expire
notificationPeriod.natural_language_description: 参数名: Notification Period (Days) | 作用: Time, in number of days, before certificate expiration, at which to generate an alert that the certificate is about to expire | 默认值: 10 | (必填项)

certificateBundle.name: certificateBundle
certificateBundle.description: Whether to parse the certificate chain as a single file after linking the server certificate to its issuer's certificate within the file
certificateBundle.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate Bundle | 作用: Whether to parse the certificate chain as a single file after linking the server certificate to its issuer's certificate within the file | 默认值: False

fileLocation.name: fileLocation
fileLocation.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Location | 默认值: /nsconfig/ssl/ | (必填项)

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output in Field | 作用: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fileName (值: None) - Name of the file. It should not include filepath.

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Name of the file. It should not include filepath.
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: Name of the file. It should not include filepath. | (必填项)
